# showsHiddenFiles

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the panel displays files that are normally hidden from the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var showsHiddenFiles: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the panel displays hidden files; if [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], it does not. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Configuring the Panel’s Behavior

- **canCreateDirectories**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the panel displays UI for creating directories.
- **canSelectHiddenExtension**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the panel displays UI for hiding or showing filename extensions.
- **isExtensionHidden**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to display filename extensions.
- **isExpanded**: A Boolean value that indicates whether whether the panel is expanded.
- **Button tags**: Button tags that refer to items on the panel.
